file_content.text: Well, well. I was wondering when you'd finally show up.
This is it? There aren't more of you?
Just give up, Ironfist. I don't want to have to hurt you or your men.
Surrender!
Strange view of the situation. Guess you'd have to be a little crazy to put up the fight you have.
You're all talk.
Just give me a decent fight for once, will you?
Go ahead, then. Show me what you've got.
Bring it on.
Let's vape this worthless scum and get back to work.
What do you want?
You're going down!
Go ahead, then. Kill me.
This man has worked with Grand Moff Kilran for decades. Just think of how much he could tell us about the Empire and their plans.
How about I tell you about the giant tractor beam he's got locked onto this pitiful scow?
If you thought beating me was your ticket out of here, you've got another thing coming. Kilran's not gonna let you loose from that tractor beam anytime soon.
There must be some way to shut down the tractor beam, Ironfist. Can you tell us how?
How can we escape?
You've got to be kidding me.
There must be some way to shut down the tractor beam, Ironfist. Tell us.
Maybe if we toss Kilran your head from the air lock, he'll reconsider.
Oh yeah?
You think Kilran cares what happens to me?
Then tell us what we need to know. How do we disable the tractor beam?
It's easy. Just hop on over to Kilran's ship, walk up to the tractor beam controls and hit the big red "off" button.
Is there some other way to shut down the tractor beam?
Any other ideas?
Unless this ship has a couple hundred well-hidden turbolaser batteries, the only way that beam is going down is if someone shuts it down.
You're not being very helpful, Ironfist.
Very funny.
I don't know why we asked.
You asked. You want to shut down that tractor beam, you're gonna have to do it by hand.
Heh. So this is what it feels like. Being beaten.
You can put away the weapon. I'm done fighting.
I won't harm you any further as long as you cooperate.
Very well.
We could have settled this without bloodshed, Ironfist.
You brought this on yourself.
A true warrior never gives up his position without a fight, Jedi.
Just keep your hands where I can see them, Ironfist.
No sudden moves.
Fine, fine. I already told you, I'm done.
So if you're done fighting, does that mean I can have your gear?
Really?
Smart thinking.
Yeah, yeah. Very funny. I must be getting old.
You've done it! You've saved the ship! And you even managed to capture Ironfist alive.
Ironfist isn't a threat to us anymore.
He surrendered, actually.
Then let's find out if he can be helpful to us, instead.
I'll bet Ironfist could tell us all sorts of interesting things.
Let's see if he'll talk.
Not everyone's as ruthless as you, Ambassador.
Of course I took him alive.
I'm sorry to disappoint you, but I actually think it's good that Ironfist is still alive.
Time to die, Ironfist.
I'm not done with you.
Wait! Don't kill him! He's much more useful to us alive.
All right.
You've seen what Ironfist is capable of, you don't think we should finish him off?
What are you talking about?
This isn't your call, Ambassador. It's mine.
It's not up to you.
It's not about who's in charge. It's about what's best for the Republic.
I can't believe this....
